Posts.Content: lagartist23 wrote: After a mastectomy of the left breast, are there filler bras for women to wear? What do these specially made bras look like, inside and out?  Does a doctor specially make a silicone breast filler to put in the bras? My mom does not want implants so I think this would be another option for her. Thank you for your help with this! Log in to post a reply
